Reviews.Title: JFD antenna jumpers
Reviews.Author: J. F. Desarro
Reviews.Content: Nice jumpers that seem to be very well made. They fit my application perfectly and are a good length without being extra long.

Reviews.Title: Works as it should, good molded end cable, clean installation
Reviews.Author: scrapant
Reviews.Content: Works good, no problems. Good for connecting your video balun to your dvr. Good length. I'm surprised there is not more of a selection to choose from  when it comes to these shorter jumper cables.

ProductInfo.Name: RG59 BNC Male to Male RG59 Coaxial Cable 75 ohm Jumper Cable 3ft Lot of 4 Patch Cable For Video Application , Security Camera System
